meanings.sent1: The curious questioner raised their hand in class.
meanings.sent2: The journalist was a skilled questioner during the interview.
meanings.sent3: The little questioner kept asking 'why?' to everything.
meanings.sent4: The detective was a relentless questioner, always seeking the truth.
meanings.sent5: The persistent questioner never stopped seeking knowledge.
